title: Glow Tulip
summaries: The Glow Tulip is a pet-summoning item that summons a Caveling Gardener pet which follows the player around. It can be found rarely near the left and right edges of the world below the Surface as a plant. Depending on world size, a set amount of Glow Tulips will spawn during world generation: 2 in small worlds, 4 in medium worlds, and 6 in large worlds. Half of them are usually generated at the left side and the other half at the right side of the world.
